title: iPhone 12

title: iPhone 11 Pro
description: iPhone 11 Pro mobile was launched on 10th September 2019. The phone comes with a 5.80-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 1125x2436 pixels at a pixel density of 458 pixels per inch (ppi).
